title: DDoS Attack Mitigation
description: A security alert indicates the application is the target of a large-scale DDoS attack.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent takes ownership of the incident.

tasks.description: Engage the DDoS mitigation service (e.g., Cloudflare, Akamai) to filter the malicious traffic.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enables the 'I'm Under Attack' mode in the mitigation service provider's dashboard.

tasks.description: Monitor the traffic to ensure the mitigation is effective and legitimate user traffic can still access the site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the attack is absorbed and the application remains available.
